title: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions, ginger, and garlic. Add tomato puree and spices, cook until oil separates. Add paneer cubes and simmer with cream for 5 minutes.

title: Dal Tadka
instructions: Boil toor dal until soft. Prepare tempering with ghee, cumin, garlic, and red chili. Mix tempering into dal and simmer.

title: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook in a tandoor or pan. Prepare a creamy tomato gravy with butter and spices, then add the chicken.

title: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt. Cook rice separately, layer with chicken, and cook on dum for 20 minutes.

title: Masala Dosa
instructions: Prepare dosa batter and ferment overnight. Spread on hot pan, add potato filling, and cook until crisp.

title: Gulab Jamun
instructions: Prepare dough from khoya, shape balls, deep fry, and soak in sugar syrup.

title: Chili Paneer
instructions: Fry coated paneer cubes. Sauté onions, bell peppers, and chili sauces. Toss in the paneer.

title: Tandoori Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with hung curd and spicy tandoori masala. Roast in a clay oven or grill.

title: Matar Paneer
instructions: Cook peas and paneer in a spiced onion-tomato based gravy with spices.

title: Veg Fried Rice
instructions: Sauté chopped vegetables and garlic. Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and stir fry on high heat.

title: Hakka Noodles
instructions: Boil noodles. Stir fry vegetables with sauce, add noodles, and toss on high heat.

title: Spring Rolls
instructions: Fill thin sheets with sautéed vegetables, roll tightly, and deep fry until crisp.

title: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Top pizza base with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil. Bake until golden.

title: Penne Arrabbiata
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic and red chili flakes in tomato sauce. Toss with pasta.

title: Pav Bhaji
instructions: Mash boiled vegetables. Cook with pav bhaji masala, butter, and onions. Serve with toasted buns.

title: Mango Lassi
instructions: Blend mango pulp, yogurt, sugar, and ice until smooth and frothy.

title: Chocolate Brownie
instructions: Mix melted chocolate, butter, sugar, and flour. Bake until set and moist inside.

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Toss cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, onions, and feta cheese with olive oil and oregano.

title: Mutton Rogan Josh
instructions: Slow cook mutton with aromatic spices, yogurt, and kashmiri chilies until tender.

title: Gajar Ka Halwa
instructions: Slow cook grated carrots in milk, sugar, and ghee. Garnish with nuts.

title: Fish and Chips
instructions: Batter fry fish fillets and serve with deep fried potato strips and tartar sauce.

title: Vegetable Kurma
instructions: Mixed vegetables cooked in a flavorful coconut and cashewnut based gravy.

title: Aloo Gobi
instructions: Potatoes and cauliflower sautéed with ginger, garlic, and Indian spices.

title: Bhindi Masala
instructions: Okra sautéed with onions, tomatoes, and dry spices until slightly crisp.

title: Baingan Bharta
instructions: Smoked roasted eggplant mashed and cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

title: Prawn Masala
instructions: Juicy prawns cooked in a spicy onion-tomato thick gravy with coastal spices.

title: Idli Sambhar
instructions: Steamed rice cakes served with a spicy lentil soup and coconut chutney.

title: Vada Pav
instructions: Spicy potato fritter placed inside a bread bun with garlic chutney.

title: Pani Puri
instructions: Hollow crisp puris filled with spiced water, tamarind chutney, and potatoes.

title: Dhokla
instructions: Steamed fermented gram flour cakes garnished with mustard seeds and coriander.

title: Rajma Chawal
instructions: Red kidney beans cooked in thick gravy, served with steamed basmati rice.

title: Shahi Paneer
instructions: Cottage cheese cubes in a rich, creamy onion-cashew based royal gravy.

title: Kadai Chicken
instructions: Chicken cooked with bell peppers and freshly ground spices in a wok (kadai).

title: Lamb Chops
instructions: Grilled or pan-seared lamb chops marinated with rosemary, garlic, and olive oil.

title: Lasagna
instructions: Layers of pasta sheet, bolognese sauce, bechamel, and lots of cheese baked together.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Spaghetti tossed with eggs, hard cheese, cured pork, and black pepper.

title: Tiramisu
instructions: Coffee-flavored Italian dessert with layers of ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

title: Apple Pie
instructions: Classic dessert with a flaky pastry crust and a warm cinnamon apple filling.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Romaine lettuce and croutons with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, and parmesan.

title: Tomato Soup
instructions: Creamy blended tomatoes seasoned with herbs, served warm with croutons.

title: Falafel Wrap
instructions: Deep-fried chickpea balls wrapped in pita with hummus, tahini, and veggies.

title: Hummus
instructions: Creamy dip made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic.

title: Pad Thai
instructions: Stir-fried rice noodles with eggs, tofu, tamarind pulp, fish sauce, and peanuts.

title: Sushi Rolls
instructions: Vinegared rice rolled with seaweed, raw fish, and vegetables.

title: Ramen
instructions: Japanese noodle soup in a rich broth with meat, egg, and green onions.

title: Dim Sum
instructions: Bite-sized portions of food served in small steamer baskets or on small plates.

title: Tacos
instructions: Mexican dish consisting of a small hand-sized corn or wheat tortilla with filling.

title: Quesadilla
instructions: Tortilla filled with cheese, and sometimes meats and spices, then cooked on a griddle.

title: Burrito
instructions: Flour tortilla rolled or folded around a filling, typically beans, meat, or cheese.

title: Cheeseburger
instructions: Hamburger topped with a slice of melted cheese, served in a bun with veggies.

title: Chicken Sandwich
instructions: Crispy fried chicken breast served in a toasted bun with mayo and pickles.

title: French Fries
instructions: Golden crispy deep-fried potato strips seasoned with salt.

title: Onion Rings
instructions: Battered and deep-fried large onion slices until crunchy and golden.

title: Nachos
instructions: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, and salsa.

title: Enchiladas
instructions: Corn tortillas rolled around a filling and covered with a savory sauce.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Flat cakes cooked on a griddle, served with maple syrup and butter.

title: Waffles
instructions: Crunchy textured cakes cooked in a waffle iron, topped with fruit.

title: French Toast
instructions: Bread soaked in eggs and milk, then fried until golden brown.

title: Omelette
instructions: Beaten eggs cooked with vegetables and cheese in a frying pan.

title: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Eggs stirred or beaten together while being gently heated.

title: Eggs Benedict
instructions: Poached eggs and ham on English muffins with hollandaise sauce.

title: Shakshuka
instructions: Eggs poached in a sauce of tomatoes, chili peppers, and onions.

title: Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Thick blended fruit served in a bowl topped with granola and seeds.

title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Mashed avocado on toasted bread with various toppings.

title: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Healthy salad made with cooked quinoa, fresh vegetables, and lemon dressing.

title: Roast Chicken
instructions: Whole chicken seasoned and roasted until the skin is crispy and meat is tender.

title: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Salmon fillet grilled with lemon, garlic, and herbs.

title: Steak
instructions: Thick cut of beef grilled to your preference and served with sides.

title: BBQ Ribs
instructions: Slow cooked pork or beef ribs glazed with barbecue sauce.

title: Ratatouille
instructions: French Provencal stewed vegetable dish made with eggplant, zucchini, and peppers.

title: Quiche
instructions: Savory open-faced pastry crust with a filling of savory custard with cheese.

title: Croissant
instructions: Buttery, flaky, Viennoiserie pastry named for its historical crescent shape.

title: Donuts
instructions: Sweet deep-fried ring-shaped dough topped with glaze or sprinkles.

title: Macarons
instructions: French sweet meringue-based confection made with egg white, icing sugar.

title: Cupcakes
instructions: Small cake designed to serve one person, often with frosting on top.

title: Brownies
instructions: Square or rectangular chocolate baked treat with a fudgy texture.

title: Cheesecake
instructions: Sweet dessert consisting of one or more layers with a cream cheese mixture.

title: Panna Cotta
instructions: Italian dessert of sweetened cream thickened with gelatin and molded.

title: Gelato
instructions: Popular Italian frozen dessert similar to ice cream but with less air.

title: Sorbet
instructions: Frozen dessert made from sweetened water with flavoring, typically fruit juice.

title: Kheer
instructions: Indian rice pudding made by boiling rice with milk and sugar.

title: Rasmalai
instructions: Dessert consisting of soft paneer balls immersed in chilled creamy milk.

title: Jalebi
instructions: Deep-fried batter in pretzel shapes soaked in sugar syrup.

title: Lassi
instructions: Dahi-based drink containing a blend of water, spices or fruit.

title: Masala Chai
instructions: Tea beverage made by boiling black tea in milk and water with aromatic spices.

title: Filter Coffee
instructions: Coffee drink made by mixing frothed and boiled milk with the decoction.

title: Iced Tea
instructions: Form of cold tea often served in a glass with ice.

title: Lemonade
instructions: Sweetened lemon-flavored beverage, served cold.

title: Hot Chocolate
instructions: Heated drink consisting of shaved chocolate or cocoa powder and milk.

title: Mojito
instructions: Refreshing cocktail with white rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint.

title: Piña Colada
instructions: Sweet cocktail made with rum, cream of coconut or coconut milk, and pineapple juice.

title: Margarita
instructions: Cocktail consisting of tequila, orange liqueur, and lime juice.

title: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Stir-fried rice with scrambled eggs, vegetables, and soy sauce.

title: Chicken Chow Mein
instructions: Stir-fried noodles with chicken, vegetables, and savory sauce.

title: Veg Momos
instructions: Steamed dumplings filled with finely chopped vegetables.

title: Chicken Momos
instructions: Steamed dumplings filled with minced chicken and spices.

title: Litti Chokha
instructions: Dough balls stuffed with sattu, roasted and served with mashed vegetables.

title: Poha
instructions: Flattened rice sautéed with onions, potatoes, turmeric, and spices.

title: Upma
instructions: Thick porridge made from dry-roasted semolina with vegetables.

title: Dal Makhani
instructions: Slow cooked black lentils and kidney beans with butter and cream.

title: Malai Kofta
instructions: Fried potato and paneer balls in a rich and creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Dum Aloo
instructions: Potatoes deep fried and then cooked in a spicy and creamy gravy.

title: Aloo Posto
instructions: Classic Bengali dish of potatoes cooked in a poppy seed paste.

title: Kosha Mangsho
instructions: Rich and spicy slow-cooked mutton curry from Bengal.

title: Hyderabadi Biryani
instructions: Highly aromatic rice dish with marinated meat and spices cooked in dum style.

title: Amritsari Kulcha
instructions: Crispy leavened bread stuffed with spiced potatoes, served with chole.

title: Misal Pav
instructions: Spicy sprout curry served with bread buns and topped with farsan.

title: Dhansak
instructions: Parsi dish consisting of lentils, vegetables, and meat cooked together.

title: Patra Ni Fish
instructions: Fish coated in green chutney, wrapped in banana leaves and steamed.

title: Undhiyu
instructions: Mixed vegetable dish that is a regional specialty of Gujarat.

title: Samosa
instructions: Fried or baked pastry with a savory filling, such as spiced potatoes.

title: Kachori
instructions: Deep-fried spicy snacks made of flour and filled with various ingredients.

title: Mirchi Bajji
instructions: Long green chilies dipped in gram flour batter and deep fried.

title: Bhel Puri
instructions: Savory snack made of puffed rice, vegetables and a tangy tamarind sauce.

title: Sev Puri
instructions: Popular street snack made of small flat puris topped with potatoes and chutneys.

title: Khandvi
instructions: Savory snack made from gram flour and yogurt, rolled into small logs.

title: Appam
instructions: Pancake made with fermented rice batter and coconut milk.

title: Puttu
instructions: Steamed cylinders of ground rice layered with coconut shavings.

title: Neer Dosa
instructions: Thin, fluffy crepes made from a simple rice batter.

title: Bisi Bele Bath
instructions: Spicy, rice-based dish originating from the state of Karnataka.

title: Avial
instructions: Thick mixture of various vegetables and coconut, seasoned with coconut oil.

title: Shahi Tukda
instructions: Rich bread pudding made with fried bread slices soaked in milk and sugar syrup.

title: Petha
instructions: Translucent soft candy from Agra made from ash gourd vegetables.

title: Ghevar
instructions: Disc-shaped sweet cake made with flour and ghee, soaked in sugar syrup.

title: Mysore Pak
instructions: Rich sweet dish prepared with generous amounts of ghee, sugar and gram flour.

title: Modak
instructions: Sweet dumpling offered to Lord Ganesha, made of rice flour and coconut.

title: Kulfi
instructions: Traditional Indian dairy based frozen dessert, often called Indian ice cream.

title: Falooda
instructions: Cold dessert made with vermicelli, basil seeds and flavored syrup with milk.

title: Badam Milk
instructions: Warm and nourishing drink made with milk and almond paste with saffron.

title: Aam Panna
instructions: Refreshing summer drink made from green mangoes and spices.

title: Thandai
instructions: Cold drink prepared with a mixture of almonds, fennel seeds, and watermelon seeds.

title: Cold Coffee
instructions: Refreshing blended coffee with milk, sugar, and ice.

title: Strawberry Milkshake
instructions: Thick milkshake made with fresh strawberries and vanilla ice cream.

title: Pinacolada
instructions: Tropical drink made with pineapple juice and coconut cream.

title: Blue Lagoon
instructions: Refreshing mocktail with blue curacao, lemon juice, and sprite.

title: Virgin Mary
instructions: Tomato juice based drink with lemon, tabasco, and worcestershire sauce.

title: Watermelon Juice
instructions: Freshly squeezed watermelon juice served chilled.

title: Sweet Corn Soup
instructions: Mildly sweet and savory soup made with tender corn kernels.

title: Manchow Soup
instructions: Spicy Indo-Chinese soup served with crispy fried noodles on top.

title: Garlic Bread
instructions: Toasted bread rubbed with garlic and butter, topped with herbs.

title: Bruschetta
instructions: Italian starter with toasted bread topped with tomatoes and garlic.

title: Pasta Alfredo
instructions: Creamy white sauce pasta made with parmesan cheese and butter.

title: Vegetable Risotto
instructions: Italian rice dish cooked with broth until it reaches a creamy consistency.

title: Shepherd's Pie
instructions: Meat pie with a crust or topping of mashed potato.

title: Beef Stew
instructions: Slow cooked beef with vegetables in a savory broth.

title: Roast Lamb
instructions: Tender roast lamb seasoned with rosemary and garlic.

title: BBQ Chicken Wings
instructions: Crispy chicken wings glazed with smoky barbecue sauce.

title: Fried Shrimps
instructions: Crispy battered and deep-fried shrimps served with dip.

title: Lobster Thermidor
instructions: Creamy mixture of cooked lobster meat, egg yolks, and brandy.

title: Crab Cakes
instructions: Savory fried cakes made with crab meat, breadcrumbs, and mayo.

title: Mushroom Soup
instructions: Thick and earthy soup made with fresh mushrooms and cream.

title: Pumpkin Soup
instructions: Velvety smooth soup made from roasted pumpkin and spices.

title: Beef Wellington
instructions: Beef fillet wrapped in puff pastry with mushroom duxelles.

title: Ratatouille tart
instructions: Savory tart filled with various roasted vegetables.

title: Veg Cannelloni
instructions: Cylindrical pasta tubes filled with spinach and ricotta cheese.

title: Potato Gnocchi
instructions: Small dough dumplings made from potatoes and flour.

title: Chocolate Soufflé
instructions: Light and airy chocolate cake with a molten center.

title: Baklava
instructions: Layers of filo pastry filled with chopped nuts and honey.

title: Churros
instructions: Fried dough pastry dusted with sugar and cinnamon.

title: Profiteroles
instructions: Cream-filled choux pastry balls topped with chocolate sauce.

title: Banoffee Pie
instructions: Dessert made from bananas, cream and toffee on a buttery base.
